original_text: And you shall do what is right and good in the sight of the Lord, that it may go well with you, and that you may go in and take possession of the good land that the Lord swore to give to your fathers
korean_text: 여호와께서 보시기에 정직하고 선량한 일을 행하라 그리하면 네가 복을 받고 그 땅에 들어가서 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 아름다운 땅을 차지하리니

sentences.original_text: And you shall do what is right and good
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 옳고 선한 일을 행하라

sentences.original_text: in the sight of the Lord,
that it may go well with you,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 네게 잘 되게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: and that you may go in
and take possession of the good land
sentences.korean_translation: 그 좋은 땅을 차지하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: that the Lord swore to give to your fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅은 주께서 네 조상들에게 주시려고 맹세하신 것이라
